textBeforeTable: Flat view Next unread Next Previous First Parent Forum Complain Reply   Reply with quote   Cheers, James Completely understand if for long exposures etc. Majority of the time the animals will be moving so from what I understand I will have IS on to compensate for my unsteady hands, but will be looking at faster shutter speeds. Thanks for all your comments. It was a bean bag that I have acquired, that was just a typo (trying to do too many things at once). Jul 13, 2012
